requirement: This code is intended to implement a mode controller that switches between automatic and manual modes based on input commands and indicates when the mode has changed.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_ModeController
VAR_INPUT
	bSetToAuto		:	BOOL;	// 切换到自动模式命令
	bSetToManual	:	BOOL;	// 切换到手动模式命令
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	eCurrentMode	:	MODES;	// 当前模式
	bModeChanged	:	BOOL;	// 模式改变标志
END_VAR
